entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
